trans-unit.source: A “backward” search selects the last row in the right DataFrame whose ‘on’ key is less than or equal to the left’s key.
trans-unit.target: “向后”搜索选择右侧DataFrame中其“ on”键小于或等于左侧键的最后一行。

trans-unit.source: A “forward” search selects the first row in the right DataFrame whose ‘on’ key is greater than or equal to the left’s key.
trans-unit.target: “向前”搜索选择右侧DataFrame中其“ on”键大于或等于左侧键的第一行。

trans-unit.source: A “nearest” search selects the row in the right DataFrame whose ‘on’ key is closest in absolute distance to the left’s key.
trans-unit.target: “最近”搜索选择右侧DataFrame中其“ on”键在绝对距离上最接近左侧键的行。

trans-unit.source: A pandas.api.extensions.ExtensionDtype is similar to a numpy.dtype object. It describes the data type. Implementors are responsible for a few unique items like the name.
trans-unit.target: 甲 pandas.api.extensions.ExtensionDtype 类似于 numpy.dtype 对象。它描述了数据类型。实现者负责一些独特的项目，例如名称。

trans-unit.source: A truncate() convenience function is provided that is similar to slicing. Note that truncate assumes a 0 value for any unspecified date component in a DatetimeIndex in contrast to slicing which returns any partially matching dates:
trans-unit.target: 甲 truncate() 提供便利功能类似于切片。请注意， truncate 将返回任何部分匹配的日期，而截断将 DatetimeIndex 中任何未指定的日期组件假定为0值：

trans-unit.source: A merge_asof() is similar to an ordered left-join except that we match on nearest key rather than equal keys. For each row in the leftDataFrame, we select the last row in the rightDataFrame whose on key is less than the left’s key. Both DataFrames must be sorted by the key.
trans-unit.target: 一个 merge_asof() 是类似于有序左加入，除了我们匹配最接近的关键，而不是平等的钥匙。对于 left DataFrame 中的每一行，我们选择 right DataFrame 中的 on 键小于左侧键的最后一行。两个DataFrame都必须按键排序。

trans-unit.source: A merge_ordered() function allows combining time series and other ordered data. In particular it has an optional fill_method keyword to fill/interpolate missing data:
trans-unit.target: 一个 merge_ordered() 函数允许结合时间序列和其他有序的数据。特别是，它具有可选的 fill_method 关键字来填充/插值丢失的数据：

trans-unit.target: 一个 .sparse 访问已添加了 DataFrame 为好。有关更多信息，请参见稀疏访问器。

trans-unit.source: A Categorical can be stored in a Series or DataFrame. To create a Series of dtype category, use cat = s.astype(dtype) or Series(..., dtype=dtype) where dtype is either
trans-unit.target: 一个 Categorical 可以存储在一个 Series 或 DataFrame 。要创建一系列 cat = s.astype(dtype) category ，请使用cat = s.astype（dtype）或 Series(..., dtype=dtype) dtype = dtype ），其中 dtype 为

trans-unit.source: A CategoricalDtype can be used in any place pandas expects a dtype. For example pandas.read_csv(), pandas.DataFrame.astype(), or in the Series constructor.
trans-unit.target: 一个 CategoricalDtype 可以在任何地方熊猫使用需要一个 dtype 。例如 pandas.read_csv() ， pandas.DataFrame.astype() 或在 Series 构造函数中。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame can be enlarged on either axis via .loc.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DataFrame 可以在任一轴通过被放大 .loc 。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame in pandas is analogous to a SAS data set - a two-dimensional data source with labeled columns that can be of different types. As will be shown in this document, almost any operation that can be applied to a data set using SAS’s DATA step, can also be accomplished in pandas.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫中的 DataFrame 类似于SAS数据集-带有标记列的二维数据源，该列可以是不同类型。如本文档中将显示的那样，几乎所有可以使用SAS的 DATA 步骤应用于数据集的操作都可以在熊猫中完成。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame in pandas is analogous to a Stata data set – a two-dimensional data source with labeled columns that can be of different types. As will be shown in this document, almost any operation that can be applied to a data set in Stata can also be accomplished in pandas.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫中的 DataFrame 类似于Stata数据集–带有标签列的二维数据源，列的类型可以不同。如本文档所示，几乎所有可以应用于Stata中的数据集的操作都可以在熊猫中完成。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame with one row for each match, and one column for each group. Its rows have a MultiIndex with first levels that come from the subject Series. The last level is named ‘match’ and indexes the matches in each item of the Series. Any capture group names in regular expression pat will be used for column names; otherwise capture group numbers will be used.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DataFrame ，每个匹配项有一行，每组有一列。它的行具有一个 MultiIndex ，其第一级来自主题 Series 。最后一个级别称为'match'，并在 Series 的每个项目中索引匹配项。正则表达式pat中的任何捕获组名称都将用作列名称；否则将使用捕获组号。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame, in the case of a MultiIndex in the columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DataFrame 中为MultiIndex， MultiIndex 。

trans-unit.source: A PerformanceWarning will be raised if you are attempting to store types that will be pickled by PyTables (rather than stored as endemic types). See Here for more information and some solutions.
trans-unit.target: 一个 PerformanceWarning 会，如果你正试图将由PyTables腌制（而不是存储为流行的类型）存储类型得到提升。有关更多信息和一些解决方案，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: A Period represents a span of time (e.g., a day, a month, a quarter, etc). You can specify the span via freq keyword using a frequency alias like below. Because freq represents a span of Period, it cannot be negative like “-3D”.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Period 代表的时间跨度（例如一天，一个月，一个季度等）。您可以使用以下频率别名通过 freq 关键字指定范围。由于 freq 表示 Period 的跨度，因此不能像“ -3D”那样为负数。

trans-unit.source: A Series is the data structure that represents one column of a DataFrame. SAS doesn’t have a separate data structure for a single column, but in general, working with a Series is analogous to referencing a column in the DATA step.
trans-unit.target: 甲 Series 是数据结构，它表示一个的一列 DataFrame 。SAS没有针对单个列的单独数据结构，但是通常，使用 Series 类似于在 DATA 步骤中引用列。

trans-unit.source: A Series is the data structure that represents one column of a DataFrame. Stata doesn’t have a separate data structure for a single column, but in general, working with a Series is analogous to referencing a column of a data set in Stata.
trans-unit.target: 甲 Series 是数据结构，它表示一个的一列 DataFrame 。Stata没有针对单个列的单独数据结构，但是通常，使用 Series 类似于在Stata中引用数据集的列。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame with one row for each subject string, and one column for each group. Any capture group names in regular expression pat will be used for column names; otherwise capture group numbers will be used. If expand=False and pat has only one capture group, then return a Series (if subject is a Series) or Index (if subject is an Index).

trans-unit.source: A box plot is a method for graphically depicting groups of numerical data through their quartiles. The box extends from the Q1 to Q3 quartile values of the data, with a line at the median (Q2). The whiskers extend from the edges of box to show the range of the data. The position of the whiskers is set by default to 1.5*IQR (IQR = Q3 - Q1) from the edges of the box. Outlier points are those past the end of the whiskers.
trans-unit.target: 箱形图是一种通过四分位数以图形方式描述数字数据组的方法。箱子从数据的Q1到Q3的四分位值延伸,中位数(Q2)是一条线。蚕须从方框的边缘延伸,以显示数据的范围。晶须的位置默认设置为从方框边缘开始的1.5*IQR(IQR=Q3-Q1)。离群点是指过了晶须末端的点。

trans-unit.source: A closed interval (in mathematics denoted by square brackets) contains its endpoints, i.e. the closed interval [0, 5] is characterized by the conditions 0 <= x <= 5. This is what closed='both' stands for. An open interval (in mathematics denoted by parentheses) does not contain its endpoints, i.e. the open interval (0, 5) is characterized by the conditions 0 < x < 5. This is what closed='neither' stands for. Intervals can also be half-open or half-closed, i.e. [0, 5) is described by 0 <= x < 5 (closed='left') and (0, 5] is described by 0 < x <= 5 (closed='right').
trans-unit.target: 闭合区间（在数学中由方括号表示）包含其端点，即闭合区间 [0, 5] 的特征是条件 0 <= x <= 5 。这就是 closed='both' 的意思。开放区间（在用括号表示的数学中）不包含其端点，即开放区间 (0, 5) 的条件为 0 < x < 5 。这就是 closed='neither' 代表的意思。间隔也可以是半开或半关，即 [0, 5) 用 0 <= x < 5 （ closed='left' ）描述， (0, 5] 用 0 < x <= 5 = 5 （ closed='right' ）。

trans-unit.source: A potential issue when plotting a large number of columns is that it can be difficult to distinguish some series due to repetition in the default colors. To remedy this, DataFrame plotting supports the use of the colormap argument, which accepts either a Matplotlib colormap or a string that is a name of a colormap registered with Matplotlib. A visualization of the default matplotlib colormaps is available here.
trans-unit.target: 绘制大量列时的潜在问题是，由于默认颜色的重复，可能难以区分某些系列。为了解决这个问题， DataFrame 绘图支持使用 colormap 参数，该参数接受Matplotlib颜色图或字符串，该字符串是在Matplotlib中注册的颜色图的名称。默认matplotlib颜色图的可视化可在此处获得。

trans-unit.source: A problem occasionally arising is the combination of two similar data sets where values in one are preferred over the other. An example would be two data series representing a particular economic indicator where one is considered to be of “higher quality”. However, the lower quality series might extend further back in history or have more complete data coverage. As such, we would like to combine two DataFrame objects where missing values in one DataFrame are conditionally filled with like-labeled values from the other DataFrame. The function implementing this operation is combine_first(), which we illustrate:
trans-unit.target: 偶尔出现的问题是两个相似数据集的组合，其中一个中的值优先于另一个。一个例子是代表一个特定经济指标的两个数据系列，其中一个被认为是“较高质量”。但是，质量较低的系列可能会追溯到更久远的历史或更完整的数据覆盖范围。因此，我们希望合并两个DataFrame对象，其中一个DataFrame中的缺失值有条件地填充来自另一个DataFrame的相似标签的值。实现此操作的函数是 combine_first() ，我们将对其进行说明：

trans-unit.source: A regular expression capturing the wanted suffixes. ‘\d+’ captures numeric suffixes. Suffixes with no numbers could be specified with the negated character class ‘\D+’. You can also further disambiguate suffixes, for example, if your wide variables are of the form A-one, B-two,.., and you have an unrelated column A-rating, you can ignore the last one by specifying suffix=’(!?one|two)’
trans-unit.target: 捕获所需后缀的正则表达式。'\ d +'捕获数字后缀。可以使用否定的字符类'\ D +'指定没有数字的后缀。您也可以进一步消除后缀的歧义，例如，如果您的宽变量的格式为A-one，B-two ..，并且具有不相关的A-rating列，则可以通过指定 suffix=’(!?one|two)’ 来忽略最后一个（！？一个|两个）'

trans-unit.source: A string representing the compression to use in the output file. By default, infers from the file extension in specified path. Compression mode may be any of the following possible values: {‘infer’, ‘gzip’, ‘bz2’, ‘zip’, ‘xz’, None}. If compression mode is ‘infer’ and path_or_buf is path-like, then detect compression mode from the following extensions: ‘.gz’, ‘.bz2’, ‘.zip’ or ‘.xz’. (otherwise no compression). If dict given and mode is ‘zip’ or inferred as ‘zip’, other entries passed as additional compression options.
trans-unit.target: 表示要在输出文件中使用的压缩的字符串。默认情况下，从文件扩展名中的指定路径进行推断。压缩模式可以是以下任何可能的值：{'infer'，'gzip'，'bz2'，'zip'，'xz'，None}。如果压缩模式为“推断”，而path_or_buf与路径类似，则从以下扩展名中检测压缩模式：“。gz”，“。bz2”，“。zip”或“ .xz”。（否则不压缩）。如果给定的dict且mode为'zip'或推断为'zip'，则将其他条目作为附加压缩选项传递。

trans-unit.source: Adding a column to a DataFrame is relatively fast. However, adding a row requires a copy, and may be expensive. We recommend passing a pre-built list of records to the DataFrame constructor instead of building a DataFrame by iteratively appending records to it. See Appending to dataframe for more.
trans-unit.target: 将列添加到 DataFrame 相对较快。但是，添加一行需要一个副本，并且可能很昂贵。我们建议将预构建的记录列表传递给 DataFrame 构造函数，而不是通过迭代地 DataFrame 追加记录来构建DataFrame。有关更多信息，请参见附加到数据框。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if the underlying memory representation of the returned array matters, we recommend specifying the dtype as a concrete object rather than a string alias or allowing it to be inferred. For example, a future version of pandas or a 3rd-party library may include a dedicated ExtensionArray for string data. In this event, the following would no longer return a arrays.PandasArray backed by a NumPy array.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果返回数组的基础内存表示很重要，我们建议将 dtype 指定为具体对象，而不是字符串别名或允许其推断。例如，熊猫或第三方库的未来版本可能包含用于字符串数据的专用ExtensionArray。在这种情况下，以下将不再返回由NumPy数组支持的 arrays.PandasArray 。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, some methods support chaining a groupby operation with a windowing operation which will first group the data by the specified keys and then perform a windowing operation per group.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the closed parameter can be used to specify which side(s) the intervals are closed on. Intervals are closed on the right side by default.
trans-unit.target: 此外， closed 参数可用于指定间隔在哪一侧闭合。默认情况下，间隔在右侧关闭。

trans-unit.source: After the header, we will add a line for each related method or function, followed by a space, a colon, another space, and a short description that illustrated what this method or function does, why is it relevant in this context, and what are the key differences between the documented function and the one referencing. The description must also finish with a dot.
trans-unit.target: 在页眉之后,我们将为每个相关的方法或函数添加一行,然后是一个空格,一个冒号,另一个空格,以及一个简短的描述,说明这个方法或函数是做什么的,为什么它在这个上下文中是相关的,以及记录的函数和引用的函数之间的关键区别是什么。说明还必须以点号结束。

trans-unit.source: All pandas data structures are value-mutable (the values they contain can be altered) but not always size-mutable. The length of a Series cannot be changed, but, for example, columns can be inserted into a DataFrame. However, the vast majority of methods produce new objects and leave the input data untouched. In general we like to favor immutability where sensible.
trans-unit.target: 所有的熊猫数据结构都是值可变的（它们包含的值可以更改），但并不总是大小可变的。系列的长度不能更改，但是，例如，可以将列插入到DataFrame中。但是，绝大多数方法都会产生新的对象，并保持输入数据不变。总的来说，我们希望在合理的地方支持不变性。

trans-unit.source: All pandas objects are equipped with to_pickle methods which use Python’s cPickle module to save data structures to disk using the pickle format.
trans-unit.target: 所有的熊猫对象都配备了 to_pickle 方法，该方法使用Python的 cPickle 模块使用pickle格式将数据结构保存到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: All remaining variables in the data frame are left intact.
trans-unit.target: 数据框中所有剩余的变量都保持不变。

trans-unit.source: All values of categorical data are either in categories or np.nan. Order is defined by the order of categories, not lexical order of the values. Internally, the data structure consists of a categories array and an integer array of codes which point to the real value in the categories array.
trans-unit.target: 分类数据的所有值都在 categories 或 np.nan 中。顺序由 categories 的顺序定义，而不是值的词汇顺序。在内部，该数据结构由一个的 categories 阵列和的整数数组 codes ，其指向在现实值 categories 阵列。

trans-unit.source: All windowing operations support a min_periods argument that dictates the minimum amount of non-np.nan values a window must have; otherwise, the resulting value is np.nan. min_peridos defaults to 1 for time-based windows and window for fixed windows

trans-unit.source: Along with the data, you can optionally pass index (row labels) and columns (column labels) arguments. If you pass an index and / or columns, you are guaranteeing the index and / or columns of the resulting DataFrame. Thus, a dict of Series plus a specific index will discard all data not matching up to the passed index.
trans-unit.target: 与数据一起，您可以选择传递索引（行标签）和列（列标签）参数。如果传递索引和/或列，则可以保证得到的DataFrame的索引和/或列。因此，系列的字典加上特定的索引将丢弃所有不匹配传递的索引的数据。

trans-unit.source: Also available is the symmetric_difference operation, which returns elements that appear in either idx1 or idx2, but not in both. This is equivalent to the Index created by idx1.difference(idx2).union(idx2.difference(idx1)), with duplicates dropped.
trans-unit.target: 还可以使用 symmetric_difference 操作，该操作返回出现在 idx1 或 idx2 中的元素，但不能同时出现在两个元素中。这等效于由 idx1.difference(idx2).union(idx2.difference(idx1)) 创建的索引，其中删除了重复项。

trans-unit.source: Also, we would like sensible default behaviors for the common API functions which take into account the typical orientation of time series and cross-sectional data sets. When using ndarrays to store 2- and 3-dimensional data, a burden is placed on the user to consider the orientation of the data set when writing functions; axes are considered more or less equivalent (except when C- or Fortran-contiguousness matters for performance). In pandas, the axes are intended to lend more semantic meaning to the data; i.e., for a particular data set there is likely to be a “right” way to orient the data. The goal, then, is to reduce the amount of mental effort required to code up data transformations in downstream functions.
trans-unit.target: 另外，我们希望通用API函数具有合理的默认行为，并考虑到时间序列和横截面数据集的典型方向。当使用ndarray来存储2维和3维数据时，用户在编写函数时要考虑数据集的方向是一个负担。轴或多或少被认为是等效的（C或Fortran连续性对性能至关重要时除外）。在熊猫中，轴旨在为数据赋予更多的语义含义。也就是说，对于特定的数据集，可能存在一种“正确”的方式来定向数据。因此，目标是减少编码下游功能中的数据转换所需的精力。

trans-unit.source: Altair
trans-unit.target: Altair

trans-unit.source: Altair is a declarative statistical visualization library for Python. With Altair, you can spend more time understanding your data and its meaning. Altair’s API is simple, friendly and consistent and built on top of the powerful Vega-Lite JSON specification. This elegant simplicity produces beautiful and effective visualizations with a minimal amount of code. Altair works with Pandas DataFrames.
trans-unit.target: Altair是用于Python的声明性统计可视化库。使用Altair，您可以花费更多时间来理解数据及其含义。Altair的API简单，友好且一致，并基于强大的Vega-Lite JSON规范构建。这种优雅的简单性用最少的代码即可产生美观，有效的可视化效果。Altair可与Pandas DataFrames配合使用。

trans-unit.source: An alternate approach is that of using masked arrays. A masked array is an array of data with an associated boolean mask denoting whether each value should be considered NA or not. I am personally not in love with this approach as I feel that overall it places a fairly heavy burden on the user and the library implementer. Additionally, it exacts a fairly high performance cost when working with numerical data compared with the simple approach of using NaN. Thus, I have chosen the Pythonic “practicality beats purity” approach and traded integer NA capability for a much simpler approach of using a special value in float and object arrays to denote NA, and promoting integer arrays to floating when NAs must be introduced.
trans-unit.target: 另一种方法是使用掩码数组。掩码数组是具有关联的布尔掩码的数据数组，该布尔掩码表示是否应将每个值都视为 NA 。我个人不喜欢这种方法，因为我总体上认为这给用户和库实现者带来了沉重的负担。此外，与使用 NaN 的简单方法相比，在处理数字数据时，它会产生相当高的性能成本。因此，我选择了Pythonic的“实用性胜过纯度”方法，并且将整数 NA 功能换成了使用浮点数和对象数组中的特殊值表示 NA 的更为简单的方法，并在必须引入NA时将整数数组提升为浮点型。

trans-unit.source: An alternative to where() is to use numpy.where(). Combined with setting a new column, you can use it to enlarge a dataframe where the values are determined conditionally.
trans-unit.target: where() 的替代方法是使用 numpy.where() 。结合设置新列，您可以使用它来扩大一个数据框，在该数据框中有条件确定这些值。
